name: Iridescence (itch) (borboss)
description:
*I am aware of a bug that prevents you from completing level 3.

You are an unnamed triangle– only armed with your movement and ability to hop between colors. Collect all the colors and see how far you can get before meeting your end.

Controls:

[W/Space/↑] Jump (You can wall jump)

[A/←] Move Left

[D/→] Move Right

[1,2,3,4,5] Respectively: Red, Yellow, Green, Blue, Magenta

Credits for Iridescence:

Art & Programming: borboss

Fonts:

  • dtinth: Comic Mono (Link)
  • N3tRunn3r: C&C Red Alert (Link)

Sounds:

  • Gribgrab: Music
Note: Iridescence is not really in a "finished" state. The game may contain an game breaking bugs. Unfortunately, I was also unable to include a proper settings/pause menu in which the volume of the music is adjustable. Note2: This game was also primarily tested with a Windows debug executable, however a quick play-through in a browser showed no issues.
